mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (@rownum:=@rownum+1) rnum, ps.*, p.jpname, a.janame AS activityText FROM placesave ps, place p, activity a, (SELECT @rownum:=0) r WHERE ps.place = p.pnum AND ps.activity = a.anum ORDER BY pidx DESC ) A WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{last}
SELECT ps.*, p.jpname, a.janame AS activityText FROM placesave ps, place p, activity a WHERE pidx = #{pidx} AND ps.place = p.pnum AND ps.activity = a.anum
SELECT * FROM activity ORDER BY anum
SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM place p, placesave ps WHERE ps.place = p.pnum ORDER BY pnum
SELECT DISTINCT a.* FROM activity a, placesave ps WHERE ps.activity = a.anum ORDER BY anum
SELECT c.*, case when c.count > 0 then '韓国' ELSE '' END AS NAME FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) AS count FROM place p, placesave ps WHERE ps.place = p.pnum AND pnum < 100 ) c
